definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. Da 11:24 [[בִּזׇּה וְשָׁלָל וּרְכוּשׁ לָהֶם יִבְז֑וֹר]] plunder and spoil and possessions he will scatter among them (subj. Antiochus Epiph.)

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[בִּזַּר]], id., Ps 68:31, but rd. Imv. [[בַּזֵּר]] ([[בַּזַּר]]) (LXX SyrVer Vulgate so most; De follows MT), subj. ref. to ´[[י]], obj. [[עַמִּים]].
